mapper.insert: insert into FP_Board values( FP_BOARD_SEQ.nextval, #{member_no}, #{board_title}, #{board_content}, 0, SYSDATE)
mapper.select:
select * from ( select t1.*, ROWNUM as rnum from ( select FP_Board.* from FP_Board, FP_Member where FP_Board.member_no = FP_Member.member_no
and FP_Board.board_title like '%' || #{search_word} || '%'
and FP_Board.board_content like '%' || #{search_word} || '%'
and FP_Member.member_nick like '%' || #{search_word} || '%'
order by board_no DESC ) t1 ) t2
where t2.rnum >= (#{page_num}-1)*10+1 and t2.rnum <= #{page_num} * 10

select count(*) from FP_Board, FP_Member where FP_Board.member_no = FP_Member.member_no
and FP_Board.board_title like '%' || #{search_word} || '%'
and FP_Board.board_content like '%' || #{search_word} || '%'
and FP_Member.member_nick like '%' || #{search_word} || '%'
mapper.update: update fp_board set board_title = #{board_title}, board_content = #{board_content} where board_no = #{board_no}
update fp_board set board_readcount = board_readcount + 1 where board_no = #{board_no}
